markdown:
**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 221 2.0, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 108 2.0 **Tradition** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodline** [Harrow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=18) **Deities** [Ahriman](/Deities.aspx?ID=220), [Azathoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=161), [Gyronna](/Deities.aspx?ID=153), [Imot](/Deities.aspx?ID=139), [Lubaiko](/Deities.aspx?ID=226), [Sifkesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=81), [Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=160) **Lesson** [Lesson of Calamity](/Lessons.aspx?ID=12) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Duration** 1 round --- The target is struck with misfortune, which throws it off balance. The target must attempt a Will save. **Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
**Critical Failure** Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
name: Ill Omen
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=110" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Sources** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Harrow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=18)

**Deities**
[Ahriman](/Deities.aspx?ID=220), [Azathoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=161), [Gyronna](/Deities.aspx?ID=153), [Imot](/Deities.aspx?ID=139), [Lubaiko](/Deities.aspx?ID=226), [Sifkesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=81), [Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=160)

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Calamity](/Lessons.aspx?ID=12)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** 1 round
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Curse a creature with misfortune.
</summary>

text: Ill Omen Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 221 2.0 , Gods & Magic pg. 108 2.0 Tradition Occult Bloodline Harrow Deities Ahriman, Azathoth, Gyronna, Imot, Lubaiko, Sifkesh, Zyphus Lesson Lesson of Calamity Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Duration 1 round --- The target is struck with misfortune, which throws it off balance. The target must attempt a Will save. Success The target is unaffected. Failure The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result. Critical Failure Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
